sentences.en: At the summit the stamina and valor of our fighter pilots remained unconquerable and supreme.
sentences.cn: 最突出的是,我们的战斗机飞行员们始终保持着不可战胜的最大的毅力和勇气.

sentences.en: At the summit the stamina and valour of our fighter pilots remained unconquerable and supreme.
sentences.cn: 最突出的是,我们的战斗机驾驶员们始终保持着不屈不挠的最大的毅力和勇气.

sentences.en: He is a fighter with an unconquerable will.
sentences.cn: 他是个有着不屈不挠意志的斗士.

sentences.en: I thank whatever gods may be , For my unconquerable soul.
sentences.cn: 感谢上帝赐予我,不可征服的灵魂.

sentences.en: It is loyalty, elegance, fight, success, and unconquerable essence.
sentences.cn: 是忠诚, 是高贵, 是奔驰, 是成功, 是不可征服.

sentences.en: It is the small and humble thorns that prove the unconquerable vitality.
sentences.cn: 正是那些渺小而卑微的荆棘,让我们见证了生命力的不可战胜.

sentences.en: It'should be said that a peak is unconquerable.
sentences.cn: 应该说山峰是不可征服的.

sentences.en: MISS BENTLEY : Oh , come on , Major. You and I have wild , unconquerable desires.
sentences.cn: 班特利小姐: 得了, 少校, 你跟我都有抑制不住的欲望.

sentences.en: One of those myths, for example, is that Afghanistan is inherently unconquerable thanks to the fierceness of its inhabitants and the formidable nature of its terrain.
sentences.cn: 例如，众多谜团之一：由于其原住民的彪悍和其地势的险恶，阿富汗从本质上就是不可征服的。

sentences.en: She died on June 1, 1968, an outstanding example of the unconquerable human spirit.
sentences.cn: 海伦·凯勒于1968年6月1日与世长辞, 她可以说是人类不屈不挠精神的最佳典范.
她有一种百折不挠的精神.

sentences.en: The fortified city of Singapore was once considered unconquerable.
sentences.cn: 新加坡这个防守严密的城市曾一度看作是坚不可摧的.

sentences.en: The others, drawing a second's breath, closed in again , implacable, unconquerable, ferocious.
sentences.cn: 其他的人透一口气, 又一次围拢来, 毫不留情, 势不可当, 狰狞残忍.

sentences.en: There was an unconquerable repulsion for her in that monkish aspect.
sentences.cn: 她对这副猴子样的神气有一种无法克制的厌恶.

sentences.en: When scientists are more popular than the singers with the young, the nation unconquerable.
sentences.cn: 如果科学家比歌手更受年轻人欢迎, 那么这个民族是不可战胜的.

trans.tran_cn: 不可征服的，克服不了的，压制不了的，无敌
